/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from the middle of the street, looking towards the horizon. The sky above is a clear blue, dotted with fluffy white clouds. On either side of the street, lush green trees stand tall, their leaves rustling in the breeze. Power lines crisscross above, forming a network against the sky. Cars are parked neatly on the side of the road, their metallic bodies gleaming under the sunlight. In the distance, a solitary figure can be seen walking on the sidewalk, adding a touch of life to the scene. The image beautifully encapsulates a typical day in this bustling city.
